panels.description: Difference in system.cpu.time since the last measurement per logical CPU, divided by the elapsed time (value in interval [0,1]).
panels.title: System CPU Utilization

panels.description: The number of receive errors encountered.
panels.title: Network Errors - Receive

panels.description: The number of transmit errors encountered.
panels.title: Network Errors - Transmit

panels.description: The number of received packets dropped.
panels.title: Network Dropped - Receive

panels.description: The number of transmitted packets dropped.
panels.title: Network Dropped - Transmit

panels.description: Time disk spent activated. On Windows, this is calculated as the inverse of disk idle time.
panels.title: System Disk IO Time

panels.description: Time disk spent activated multiplied by the queue length.
panels.title: System Disk Weighted IO Time

panels.description: The queue size of pending I/O operations.
panels.title: System Disk Pending Operations

panels.description: The number of disk reads/writes merged into single physical disk access operations.
panels.title: System Disk Merged
